runs.comm: Kula gets some inward movement off the first ball, pitching outside off, and coming into McCullum, who nudges it towards midwicket
a back of a length ball on off, McCullum charges down the track and steers it towards point for a tight single
Ryder middle his first delivery, takes a good stride forward and cracks it towards backward point

shortish ball, sliding down the leg, McCullum was jumping down the pitch and moving towards the leg side as well, Kula cramped him for room, and McCullum's pull gets an under edge  which bounces back to the bowler
again McCullum makes room and slashes this towards third man, not too well timed and the fielder at the deep runs across to his right to cut that one off
length ball, angling into McCullum, tried to flick it to the leg side, gets an inside edge which takes the ball towards first slip
fullish ball outside off, Ryder stays rooted to the crease and opens the face to guide it to third man
McCullum continues to waltz down the pitch, length ball which McCullum defends towards point
McCullum gets the first six of the day, his favourite upper-cut does the job, short and wide from Malinga, quick hands from McCullum, who sends the ball sailing over wide third man
short on legstump, hit on the arm guard and the ball dribbles to short fine leg
a wide down the leg side, Malinga sometimes struggles with his accuracy because of that low action
back of a length on leg stump this time, Ryder flicks it nonchalantly off his thigh pad towards deep fine leg
another short ball, on offstump, this doesn't climb too high, McCullum was looking to duck it, adjusts at the last moment to dab it towards first slip

McCullum is gone, one of the most unlucky ways to be dismissed, Ryder punches the ball firmly towards Kulasekara, who gets his fingers on it and deflects onto the non-striker's stumps, McCullum was well out of his ground, the crowd erupts. Bad luck for McCullum, the ball just about brushed the bails, an inch higher and McCullum would still be there
slower ball from Kulasekara, inside edged towards the leg side
swung away from Ryder, a bit of width for him, he jabs it towards the covers
overpitched on offstump, lovely off drive from Ryder, mid-off was  at the edge of the ring, but he didn't move quickly enough to his left to cut that off
again outside off, Ryder steers that towards third man for a single
solid forward defensive to start off
Ryder doesn't bother with the footwork as he swishes at a delivery well outside off, he misses
length ball from Malinga, how often do you see that? 89.2mph,  Ryder gets half-forward and looks to punch it towards mid-off, again he's beaten
this time he connects, and threads it between cover and extra cover, again not the footwork that a coach will like, but he gets enough behind it to send it racing to the boundary

slower yorker, 122kmh, Ryder was completely baffled by that one, just about manages to get some bat on it, inside edge towards fine leg for a single, Ryder doesn't know where the ball is for quite a while after he hits it
Guptill gets forward and defends it towards cover
another slower one from Malinga, 127kmh, full and outside off, Guptill is tricked by the change of pace, he plays it uppishly towards mid-off, lands well before the fielder though
back of a length, in the channel outside off, Guptill chops it off the back foot towards backward point

drama here, Ryder comes charging down the pitch, Kulasekara gets the ball to move into the batsman, Ryder can only push it back to the bowler, Kulasekara throws the ball towards the stumps to run him out but hits Ryder instead

Ryder is gone, change of pace from Kulasekara, Ryder was early into his shot, spoons it high towards mid-off, where Bandara completes a well-judged catch, that ball was in the air a long time but Bandara kept his cool
length ball just outside off, a crisp drive towards mid-off for a single
length ball, heading towards middle, Taylor moves across and clips it towards midwicket
punched to cover, there was no run available, but Sri Lanka help Taylor get off the mark with an overthrow
short and wide, clubbed towards extra cover, a bit of an underedge on that shot from Taylor
back of a length, tight around off, flashes it uppishly towards backward point, lands only a few yards short of Tillakaratne Dilshan there, who gets his fingers on it but can't stop it
short of a length, pushed towards cover, Kapugedera fields and shies at the stumps, Taylor would have just made his ground
Mathews reamins accurate around the offstump, Guptill plays it towards mid-off for a single
this time he gives some width, and Taylor pounces on it, gets up on his toes and flashes it past backward point, a lot of power behind that shot
and again, this time he gets down the track and crunches it to the right of cover for another boundary, ten runs off the over
starts with an offspiner, on-driven for a single
legcutter this time, pushed towards long-off for a single
again there's not much footwork as Guptill looks to drive, a big outside edge goes past first slip, and races for a four
back of a length, heading for middle, Guptill backs away and tries to cut, inside edge towards cover

Guptill is beaten all ends up there, fullish offspiner, beaten by the turn as he looks to whip it away, misses, and Sangakkara collects but Guptill's back leg was in teh crease even if the keeper broke the stumps
Fuller delivery on the off stump. Guptill pushes it to mid-on
slightly fuller, and shifts his line towards offstump, pushed towards mid-off for a single
a googly from Bandara, sliding down the leg side, appeal from Bandara, umpires not interested
another googly from Bandara, Guptill doesn't pick it, gets an edge as he looks to play it towards the leg side
pushed towards the off side for a single
on the pads, driven towards mid-on
wrong 'un from Mendis, batsman is fooled by that one and is hit on the pads, just outside off though
decides to sweep this one, gets it away to deep backward square leg
another wrong 'un, well outside off, cut  away past point
quicker ball from Mendis, fullish and just outside off, powered down to long-off
Taylor brings out his favourite slog-sweep, connects nicely with the ball and gets it wide of the square leg fielder to get another boundary
pitched up on the legstump, driven inside out towards sweeper cover
on the pads again, played firmly towards mid-on this time
tossed up from Bandara, ends up as a full toss on offstump, Taylor hits it form;ly back to the bowler
overpitched on midde and leg, clipped towards wide long-on for a couple
full again, the batsman makes room and digs the ball out towards sweeper cover
he nearly strikes first ball, a harmlessly length ball on legstump, Taylor goes for the sweep, top edges it but lands safely away from Mendis at short fine leg
another slog sweep from Taylor, shuffles across and gets it behind deep square leg
on-drive from Guptill,  Jayasuriya gets well across to cut it across
dropped, Guptill heaves it away towards midwicket, Mathews misjudges it and is a bit too far in from the boundary, has to run back to take the catch but he can't hold on to it
on the pads, turned away towards fine leg, deep square has to  runs across to cut that one off
lovely swing of the bat from Guptill, flighted delivery from Bandara, Guptill takes a couple of paces down the pitch and launches it straight for a six, brings up the fifty partnership
he's gone this time, Guptill sweeps a leg stump delivery powerfully, a bit of a top edge and it sails towards Kapugedera at deep midwicket, easy catch and that's the end of Guptill
Bandara pitches well outside leg, and can't get it to turn enough, that's a wide
Taylor plays it with soft hands towards long-on, Jacob Oram sprints back for the second
clipped wide of midwicket this time, the fielder has to run across to his left to pick that up, enough time to get a couple
driven down to long-off this time, Taylor walks the single
length ball on offstump, Oram defends watchfully back to the bowler
Mendis starts with a legbreak, pushed towards cover for a single
length ball, hits Oram on the pads outside leg, the ball rolls towards square leg
a bit of width for Taylor, who chops it towards point

Mendis gives this one a bit of air, the ball turns past Oram's bat, Sangakkara whips off the bails and belts out a loud appeal, third umpire is called for, hard to tell whether Oram's foot was in the air, umpire rightly rules it not out
on the pads, flicked towards wide mid-on for a single
big legspinner from Mendis, pitching on offstump, Taylor opts against playing a stroke
pitched on legstump, turned to deep midwicket
googly, plays it inside out towards long-off for another single
full on middle and leg, pushed towards long-on
a bit of width, Taylor tries to dab it but can't beat short third man
drills it past cover this time
almost yorker length on middle stump, dug out back towards the bowler, superb delivery to end a great spell from Bandara, only 25 runs off it
down the leg side, he'll have to re-bowl that one
outside off, inside-edged onto his boot, the ball dribbles towards slip
Taylor shuffles across even before Jayasuriya bowls, a full ball is drilled towards long-on
again it's overpitched, on middle stump, reverse-swept towards backward point
Taylor tries to shows us he can reverse-sweep as well, but top -edges and it lobs just over Sangakkara
Taylor reverts to his favourite slog-sweep, picks the gap between midwicket and long-on, brings up the hundred with that stroke
even better this time, the heave over midwicket continues to fetch Taylor plenty of runs, it smashes into one of the pillars in the stands behind the midwicket boundary
full and swinging away from Oram, who digs it out towards deep square leg
lovely shot from Taylor for just a single, drives a length ball towards sweeper cover
Oram goes for the big mow towards  wide long-on, outside edges it and it hovers in the air for a long time, Bandara at the third man boundary lost it in the lights, and it lands short of him
full, fast, inswinging yorker, Taylor blocks it with the full face of the bat, 138kmh that one
another yorker, Taylor manages to dig it out towards point for a single, can't do more than that with a pinpoint yorker
and another one from Malinga, Oram just about gets his bat behind it, the ball rolls away towards cover, Malinga doing what he does best
shovelled towards long-on, Oram was haring back for a tight second, the throw wasn't very good so Oram is safe
Taylor mows it towards midwicket, doesn't strike it very well, and it bounces a couple of times before reaching deep square leg
again Taylor moves across the stump and looks to heave it to midwicket, bottom edge towards short fine leg
Oram holes out to Kulasekara at long-off, he gave himself room and tried to launch Mendis over long-off, but gets under it too much, the ball goes very high but doesn't have enough distance on it
very full on offstump, the batsman can only push it back to the bowler
a bit of width from Mendis this time, the batsman looks to cut, a thick bottom edge sends the ball back onto the pitch
back of a length, jags into Broom., a bit of an inside edge towards midwicket
he slugs this one down to long-on, Broom sprints back for the second

angling across Taylor, well outside off stump, Taylor was looking to flash itthr4ough the cover, gets a top edge towards third man, Kulasekara was charging in from the boundary but it lands short of him
came down the pitch and thrashed it towards cover, but debutant Rupasinghe does well to cut that one off
great shot from Taylor, length ball outside off, Taylor hammers it over point for a boundary
this was a lot fuller, Taylor goes for the same shot but gets it on the toe end of the bat, Kulasekara is waiting at the third man boundary for that one, and he gobbles it up

full on middle and leg, the batsman shuffles across and clips it towards square leg, Mathews charges in from the boundary and picks it up just outside the circle, fires in a flat throw to Sangakkara, who takes off the bails with McGlashan just short of his crease, Sangakkara collected that one in front of the stumps instead of waiting behind
full and on off stump, punched back to the bowler
fractionally shorter than the previous one, Mills makes room and drives it formly inside-out towards long-off
ovepitched on middle and leg, makes room and drives it over the bowler's head, not much power in that but picked his spot well, New Zealand need more of those
full and well outside off, Mills was backing away, leans across and chops it towards point
shortish ball, Broom wanted to  heave that to the leg side, gets an edge which sends the ball towards cover

slower ball, foxes Broom, who is very lucky to survive, a sitter dropped by Sangakkara, Broom mow goes straight up in the air, is thre for plenty of time, Sangakkara calls for it and runs up to be near the stumps, but misjudges it and has to dive forward at the last moment, doesn't hold on to it
Malinga's yorker does the trick, fast and heading for the base of middle stump, better batsmen than Mills have had no answer to that one

Malinga's on a hat-trick, yet again the middle stump is rocked back, Vettori was backing away an looking to cut, he misses and that's the end of Vettori, slightly shorter from Malinga this time, but good enough
again in the blockhole, swings in towards the pads, struck outside the leg stump, and the ball rolls away towards square leg
shortish ball from Malinga, the batsman was backing away and had to reach across to chop that one, gets a bottom edge towards point

three runs even though the batsman didn't offer a shot, the batsman was well outside leg stump and couldn't even reach Malinga's outside off delivery, the batsmen set off for a bye, Sangakkara throws towards the non-striker's end, and there are a couple of overthrows to be had for New Zealand
